cause.description:
This cause was created in hopes that we can all work together and help David stop "Goating" the unexpected. He has tormented us for too long and this must stop. All donations will go to purchasing rubber bands to shoot at David's "tool box" if he should attempt to "Goat" someone.
1. The "Goating" must end!!!
cause.name: End David's Addiction To "Goating"
